00007 class SceneNode

00009 protected:
00010 
00011     //The position of the scene node

00015     point3f_t m_rotation;

00017     //The children of this scene node
00018     std::vector<SceneNode*> m_childNodes;
00019 
00020 public:
00021 
00022     SceneNode()
00023     {
00024     }
00025 
00026     virtual ~SceneNode()
00027     {
00028         //Get the number of children
00029         unsigned int numberOfChildren = numChildren();
00030 
00031         //Delete each child
00032         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < numberOfChildren; ++i)
00033         {
00034             delete m_childNodes[i];
00035         }
00036 
00037         //Clear the children
00038         m_childNodes.clear();
00039     }
00040 
00041     void addChildNode(SceneNode* node)
00042     {
00043         m_childNodes.push_back(node);
00044     }
00045 
00046     void removeChildNode(SceneNode* node)
00047     {
00048         //Get the number of children
00049         unsigned int numberOfChildren = numChildren();
00050 
00051         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < numberOfChildren; ++i)
00052         {
00053             if (m_childNodes[i] == node)
00054             {
00055                 m_childNodes.erase(m_childNodes.begin() + i);
00056                 return;
00057             }
00058 
00059         }
00060 
00061         //If it gets here then the node wasn't found
00062     }
00063 
00064     virtual void update(float seconds)
00065     {
00066 
00067         unsigned int nChildren = numChildren();
00068 
00069         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < nChildren; ++i)
00070         {
00071             m_childNodes[i]->update(seconds);
00072         }
00073     }
00074 
00075     virtual void draw(Camera* cam)
00076     {
00077         unsigned int nChildren = numChildren();
00078 
00079         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < nChildren; ++i)
00080         {
00081             m_childNodes[i]->draw(cam);
00082         }
00083     }
00084 
00085     unsigned int numChildren()
00086     {
00087         return m_childNodes.size();
00088     }
00089 
00090     SceneNode* getChild(unsigned int i)
00091     {
00092         return m_childNodes[i];
00093     }
00094
